title: Derek Whitacre and Emilia Hartford
description:
2 Part Show! Composer/filmmaker/Porsche driver, Derek Whitacre and then drifter/wrench/YouTuber, Emilia Hartford. 

1st: Derek Whitacre -who brought his turbocharged 1982 Porsche 911SC to a One Take shoot that had rain, which is perfect - is here to talk about car and his documentary, "We Live Machinery", about the 2015 Targa Baja California.

2nd: Emilia Hartford is a YouTuber, wrench, time attacker-turned-drifter who quit her day job to build cars and make YouTube videos full time. She sits down to talk about LS1 swaps, center cards, clickbait, charity, and a lot more .

 

This show is available as a video!  https://youtu.be/28Fy7QjbH_A


Derek Whitacre
- IG: @real_derek_whitacre
- Documentary "We Live Machinery" at https://chassy.com/product/we-live-machinery/ 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKp3Jh8Slcs

Emilia Hartford
- www.youtube.com/c/emiliahartford
- IG: @ms.emilia
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
